tasks.text: Prepare a healthy and nutritious breakfast
Read a chapter from a book on personal development.
Write a journal entry reflecting on your day and emotions.
Research and learn a new skill or hobby, like playing a musical instrument or painting.
Clean and organize a specific area in your home, like your closet or desk.
Plan and prepare a balanced meal for dinner.
Call or meet up with a friend you haven't spoken to in a while.
Spend 15 minutes meditating or practicing mindfulness.
Create a budget for the upcoming month and set financial goals.
